clearCompletedDescription: Completed T'-Dos are scuttled aft 30 days fer non-subscribers 'n 90 days fer subscribers.
clearCompletedConfirm: Are ye sure ye wants t' scuttle yer completed T'-Dos?
sureDeleteCompletedTodos: Are ye sure ye want t' delete yer completed T'-Dos?
lotOfToDos: Yer most recent 30 completed T'-Dos are shown here. Ye can see older completed T'-Dos from Data > Data Display Tool or Data > Export Data > User Data.
deleteToDosExplanation: If ye jab th' button below, all o' yer completed T'-Dos 'n archived T'-Dos will be permanently scuttled, except fer T'-Dos from active challenges 'n Ship Plans. Export them first if ye wants t' keep a log o' them.
addMultipleTip: Tip: T' add multiple <%= taskType %>, separate each one usin' a line break (Shift + Enter) 'n then press "Enter."
habitsDesc: Habits don' 'ave a rigid ske-jewel. Ye kin check 'em off multiple times per day.
checklistText: Break a task into smaller pieces! Checklists increase th' Experience an' Gold gained from a T'-Do, an' reduce th' damage caused by a Daily.
taskAliasPopover: This task alias can be used when integratin' wit' 3rd party integrations. Only dashes, underscores, 'n alphanumeric characters are supported. Th' task alias must be unique among all yer tasks.
taskAliasPopoverWarning: WARNING: Changin' this value will break any 3rd party integrations that rely on th' task alias.
difficultyHelp: Difficulty describes how challengin' a Habit, Daily, or T'-Do be fer ye t' complete. A higher difficulty results in greater rewards when a Task be completed, but also greater damage when a Daily be missed or a negative Habit be clicked.
attributeAllocationHelp:
Stat allocation be an option that provides methods fer Habitica t' automatically assign an earned Stat Point t' a Stat immediately upon level-up.

Ye can set yer Automatic Allocation method t' Task Based in th' Stats section o' yer profile.
dailysDesc: Dailies repeat on a regular basis. Choose th' schedule that works best fer ye!
repeatHelpTitle: How often should this task be repeated?
dailyRepeatHelpContent: This task will be due every X days. Ye can set tha' value below.
weeklyRepeatHelpContent: This task will be due on th' highlighted days below. Click on a day t' activate/deactivate it.
repeatWeek: On Certain Days o' t' Week
todosDesc: T'-Dos needs t' be completed once. Add checklists t' yer T'-Dos t' increase thar value.
rewardsDesc: Loot be a great way t' use Habitica 'n complete yer tasks. Try addin' a few today!
startDateHelp: Set th' date for which this task takes effect. Will not be due on earlier days.
streakText: Has performed <%= count %> 21-day streaks on Dailies
streakSingularText: Has performed a 21-day streak on a Daily
perfectText: Completed all active Dailies on <%= count %> days. Wit' this bounty ye get a +level/2 buff t' all Stats fer th' next day. Levels greater than 100 don't 'ave any additional effects on buffs.
perfectSingularText: Completed all active Dailies in one day. Wit' this achievement, ye get a +level/2 buff t' all Stats fer th' next day. Levels greater than 100 don't 'ave any additional effects on buffs.
streakerAchievement: Ye 'ave attained th' "Streaker" Achievement! Th' 21-day mark be a milestone fer habit formation. Ye can continue t' stack this Achievement fer every additional 21 days, on this Daily or any other!
fortifyPop: Return all tasks t' neutral value (yellow color), 'n restore all lost Health.
fortifyText: Strengthenin' will return all yer tasks, except challenge tasks, t' a neutral (yellow) state, as if ye'd jus' added them, 'n top yer Health off t' full. 'tis great if all yer red tasks are makin' th' game too hard, or all yer blue tasks are makin' th' game too easy. If startin' fresh sounds much more motivatin', spend th' Sapphires 'n catch a reprieve!
sureDelete: Are ye sure ye want to delete this task?
dailiesRestingInInn: Yo'rg Restin' in t' Inn! Your Dailies will NOT hurt you tonight, but they WILL still refresh every day. If yo'rge in a quest, you won't deal damage/collect items until you check out o' t' Inn, but you can still be injured by a Boss if your Party lads skip their own Dailies.
habitHelp1: Good Habits are things that ye do often. They award Gold an' Experience every time ye click th' <%= plusIcon %>.
habitHelp2: Bad Habits are things ye want to avoid doing. They remove Health every time ye click the <%= minusIcon %>.
habitHelp3: Fer inspiration, check out these sample Habits!
newbieGuild: More questions? Ask in th' <%= linkStart %>Habitica Help guild<%= linkEnd %>!
dailyHelp1: Dailies repeat <%= emphasisStart %>every day<%= emphasisEnd %> that they be active. Click th' <%= pencilIcon %> t' change th' days a Daily be active.
dailyHelp2: If ye don't complete active Dailies, ye lose Health when yer day rolls over.
dailyHelp3: Dailies turn <%= emphasisStart %>redder<%= emphasisEnd %> when ye miss them, an' <%= emphasisStart %>bluer<%= emphasisEnd %> when ye complete them. Th' redder the Daily, th' more it will reward yeâ€‰... or hurt ye.
dailyHelp4: T' change when yer day rolls over, go t' <%= linkStart %> Settings > Site<%= linkEnd %> > Custom Day Start.
dailyHelp5: Fer inspiration, check out these sample Dailies!
toDoHelp1: T'-Dos start yellow, an' get redder (more valuable) th' longer it takes t' complete 'em.
toDoHelp2: T'-Dos never hurt ye! They only award Gold an' Experience.
toDoHelp3: Breakin' a T'-Do down into a checklist o' smaller items will make it less scary, and will increase yer points!
toDoHelp4: Fer inspiration, check out these sample To-Dos!
rewardHelp1: Th' Equipment ye buy fer yer avatar be stored in <%= linkStart %>Inventory > Equipment<%= linkEnd %>.
rewardHelp2: Equipment affects yer Stats (<%= linkStart %>Avatar > Stats<%= linkEnd %>).
rewardHelp3: Special equipment will appear here durin' World Events.
rewardHelp4: Don't be afraid t' set custom Rewards! Check out some samples here.
taskAliasAlreadyUsed: Task alias already used on another task.
invalidTaskType: Task type must be one o' "habit", "daily", "t'-do", "reward".
invalidTasksType: Task type must be one o' "habits", "dailys", "t'-dos", "rewards".
invalidTasksTypeExtra: Task type must be one o' "habits", "dailys", "t'-dos", "rewards", "completedT'-dos".
cantDeleteChallengeTasks: A task belongin' t' a challenge can't be deleted.
checklistOnlyDailyTodo: Checklists are supported only on Dailies 'n T'-Dos
checklistItemNotFound: No checklist item was found wit' given id.
tagNotFound: No tag item was found wit' given id.
tagIdRequired: "tagId" must be a valid UUID correspondin' t' a tag belongin' t' th' user.
positionRequired: "position" is required 'n must be a number.
alreadyTagged: Th' task already be tagged wit' given tag.
intelligenceExample: Relatin' t' academic or mentally challengin' pursuits
perceptionExample: Relatin' t' work or financial tasks
constitutionExample: Relatin' t' health, wellness, 'n social interaction
taskRequiresApproval: This task must be approved afore ye can complete it. Approval has already been requested
taskApprovalWasNotRequested: Only a task waitin' fer approval can be marked as needin' more work
repeatTypeHelpTitle: What kind o' repeat does this be?
repeatTypeHelp: Select "Daily" if ye wants this task t' repeat every day or every third day, etc. Select "Weekly" if ye wants it t' repeat on certain days o' th' week. If ye select "Monthly" or "Yearly", adjust th' Start Date t' control which day o' th' month or year th' task will be due on.
monthlyRepeatHelpContent: This task be due ev'ry X months
yearlyRepeatHelpContent: This task be due ev'ry X years
checkOffYesterDailies: Check off any Dailies ye did yesterday:
yesterDailiesTitle: Ye left these Dailies unchecked yesterday! Do ye wants t' check off any o' them now?
yesterDailiesOptionTitle: Confirm that this Daily wasn't done afore applyin' damage
yesterDailiesDescription: If this settin' be applied, Habitica will ask ye if ye meant t' leave th' Daily undone afore calculatin' 'n applyin' damage t' yer avatar. This can protect ye against unintentional damage.
repeatDayError: Ensure that ye 'ave at least one day o' th' week selected.
sessionOutdated: Yer session be outdated. Refresh or sync.
errorTemporaryItem: This item be temporary 'n cannot be pinned.
